column2: Nigeria's Oando to sell 60 pct of downstream business for $276 mln LAGOS
column3: June 30 Nigeria's Oando has agreed to sell a 60 percent stake in its downstream business to a consortium of investors including Vitol for $276 million

column2: Gerresheimer sells tubing glass business for 196 mln eur to Corning FRANKFURT
column3: June 30 German drugs packaging firm Gerresheimer said on Tuesday it aimed to sell its tubing glass business to U.S. glass manufacturer Corning  for 196 million euros ($219.42 million)
column4: in an effort to streamline its business.

column2: REFILE-Emerson Electric to spin off network power business June 30 U.S. factory automation equipment maker Emerson Electric Co said it plans to spin off its network power business into a publicly traded company as part of its efforts to focus on its high-growth businesses.
